creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: two images; image at L of crouching man looking at a monkey, who peers through a pair of spectacles on a cord around man's neck; image in LRC of a splay-legged camel with a rider, sail and anchor
inscription:
Signature; Title; Inscription
LRC and URC, in pencil: various notes
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Louis/ Legrand/ Anatomie Comparée]; LRC, in the plate: [Le Vaisseau du desert]
title: Anatomie Comparée/ Le Vaisseau de Désert
